com.conversantmedia.mapreduce.tool.event

Class AnnotatedToolListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.conversantmedia.mapreduce.tool.event.AnnotatedToolListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ToolListener<AnnotatedToolContext>

    public class AnnotatedToolListener
extends Object
implements ToolListener<AnnotatedToolContext>
    Wraps the annotation-specified listener and adapt between the AnnotatedToolContext and the caller's own context bean.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.conversantmedia.mapreduce.tool.event.ToolListener
